def.dt: :an idea of what something is or how it works She is familiar with basic concepts of psychology. not a new concept a concept borrowed from computer programming She seems to be a little unclear on the concept of good manners. [=she seems not to understand what good manners are]
:organized around a main idea or theme a concept album [=a collection of songs about a specific theme or story]
:created to show an idea a concept car [=a car built to test or show a new design]
:the idea that you have about the kind of person you are Children need to develop a positive self-concept.
